channel.title: Transport Layer on
channel.description: Recent content in Transport Layer on

item.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to TCP/IP
item.description: The TCP/IP Networking Model: The TCP/IP Networking Model has been in development for some time, replacing the antequated and unorganized proprietary protocols of the past. It provides a layered networking model and standard for different organizations to work with to allow for seamless communication between disparate systems. Table 1-2 TCP/IP Architectural Model and Example Protocols: TCP/IP Architectural Layer Example Protocols Application HTTP, POP3, SMTP Transport TCP, UDP Internet IP Link Ethernet, Point to Point (PPP), T1 TCP/IP Application Layer Provides services to network applications.
